content.description:
Directions: Suggested time - 10 minutes

"Quid struis? Aut qua spe Libycis teris otia terris?

Si te nulla movet tantarum gloria rerum,

nec super ipse tua moliris laude laborem,

Ascanium surgentem et spes heredis Iuli

(5) respice, cui regnum Italiae Romanaque tellus

debetur."
content.question: In lines 2-3, to what cultural values does the speaker refer in the attempt to motivate Aeneas? Refer specifically to the Latin in support of your answer.

frqParts.text: In lines 2-3, to what cultural values does the speaker refer in the attempt to motivate Aeneas? Refer specifically to the Latin in support of your answer.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 3.A: Develop an interpretation of a Latin text.
